overview: Lucio and Enedina are a happily married young Teenek couple that lives in the Huasteca Potosina's jungle with their three children. They love each other and share everything, nevertheless, everything crumbles when the construction of a highway, that their community has been requesting for so long, finally arrives.

production_companies.name: Secretaria de Cultura de San Luis Potos√≠

tagline: Passion should be lived in secrecy
title: Your Lover
